<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v5/repos/{owner}/{repo}/commits/{sha}/comments"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>





<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"sha","in":"path","description":"评论的sha值","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"owner","in":"path","description":"仓库所属空间地址(企业、组织或个人的地址path)","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"repo","in":"path","description":"仓库路径(path)","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["body"],"type":"object","properties":{"accessToken":{"type":"string"},"body":{"type":"string","description":"评论内容"},"path":{"type":"string","description":"文件的相对路径"},"position":{"type":"integer","description":"Diff的相对行数","format":"int32"},"needToResolve":{"type":"boolean","description":"是否需要解决(true：评审意见需要解决，false：评审意见不需要解决, 默认为 false)"}},"title":"CreatedCommitCommentsReq"},"example":""}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
